text: Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma Zisas ruagim, Herot zumgum Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma ndim bɨna khɨngi. Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma mba gumgi gu mbigi ruav kim, Zisas zim, Zon vhɨra ana ruagi. Zon Gumgi Ruai Guma Zisas ruagim, ana Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuaim, Heven fhogim, Fhe Bakɨme Ŋina Ŋaar fhomne fara muuŋgiap gegap, zerap, ana perigi. Ana ana perigim, Fhe Bakɨme Hevenan kav khaŋ nzuai, “Ndu nan Kam ma! Gu guigira ndu vuzvugiap ndun ndikndigi!”
